00031 #ifndef DEFAULT_TIMEBASE
00032 # ifdef CELL_ENV_TSDK
00033 #  define DEFAULT_TIMEBASE       (1.2e8)        
00034 # else
00035 #  define DEFAULT_TIMEBASE       (8.0*1.0e7)    
00036 # endif
00037 #endif /* !TIMEBASE */
00038 
00039 /* makes a small jitter */
00040 #define DELAY() do { volatile int __z = (ctk_rand() & 0xfff); while (__z--); } while (0)
00041 
00042 #ifdef DEBUG
00043 # include <stdio.h>
00044 # ifdef CELL_ENV_TSDK
00045 #  define printf        ctk_printf
00046 # endif /* CELL_ENV_TSDK */
00047 # define DEBUG_PRINTF(...)  do { \
00048       printf("[%s:%d] ", __FILE__, __LINE__); \
00049       printf(__VA_ARGS__); \
00050     } while (0)
00051 # define DBG(x)  do { DEBUG_PRINTF("%s\n", #x); x; } while (0)
00052 #else /* !DEBUG */
00053 # define DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...) 
00054 # define DBG(x)  x
00055 #endif /* !DEBUG */
00056 
00058 #define hl2ea(_h, _l)   (spu_extract((vector unsigned long long) \
00059   spu_sel(spu_promote(_h, 0), spu_promote(_l, 1), \
00060         ((vector unsigned int){0,-1,0,0})), 0))
00061 
00062 #ifndef likely
00063 
00064 # define likely(_c)      __builtin_expect((_c), 1)
00065 
00066 # define unlikely(_c)    __builtin_expect((_c), 0)
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 #endif /* _CTK_SPU_DEFS_H */
